entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 25 December 2022
